name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rate My Professor Extension (Any University, Any Website)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check info about professors by simply inputting their name eliminating the need to switch tabs, or use our new right click feature!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of juggling multiple RateMyProfessors tabs while planning your courses? Our Chrome extension is here to make your life easier!

With Version 2, we've added exciting new features:

   • Contextual Search: Highlight a professor's name on any webpage, right-click, and select "Search This Professor" to quickly find ratings and details without opening the extension.

   • Enhanced Information: We've added more descriptions from RateMyProfessors, including:

      • Tags: View useful tags such as "Test Heavy" to get insights into the professor's teaching style.

      • Number of Ratings: See how many students have rated the professor.

      • Detailed Comments: Access more comprehensive details about individual comments for a clearer picture of the professor’s strengths and weaknesses.

   • Optimized Search: We've fine-tuned our queries to deliver more accurate and relevant results, ensuring you get the most precise professor information available

With just a few clicks, you can:

   • Search for Professor Ratings: Enter the professor's name and select your University/College to instantly retrieve detailed, real-time statistics from RateMyProfessors.

   • View Ratings and Comments: Get up-to-date ratings, comments, and more without ever leaving your current page.

We developed this extension to eliminate the hassle of navigating through RateMyProfessors' various search queries and to streamline your course selection process.

Why Choose Us?

   • Works for ANY University/College: No matter where you are studying, our extension has you covered.
   
   • Real-Time Queries: Receive the most current information available.

   • Seamless Integration: Effortlessly search and view professor ratings directly from any webpage.
   
   • Experience a more efficient and stress-free way to select your courses. Install our extension and get reliable professor insights right at your fingertips!

Issues/Feedback/Questions? Email us at: rmpextension.dev@gmail.com
